name: Soul of the Piano
description: While the piano is simple to play (you just have to press the keyboard at least), capturing the real sound and the real soul of the piano are not that simple. Beside the needs of a good player, we need a certain kind of acoustic room system, proper microphones, cabling systems, hardwares and softwares, the most basic part is that we need to understand how the piano generate its special sound from its own inner body and how to set the microphone properly.
